text: Peel and clean the prawns. Do this with salt and turmeric powder to prevent smell, and boil them without adding any water to make them dry (half cooked). Add oil to a cooking pan and. Once the oil is heated, add the chopped onions, green chili chopped, some curry leaves and a pinch of turmeric powder. After the onions are sauteed and turned into light brown shade, add two spoons of ginger garlic paste and sauté it. Add the half cooked prawns into the cooking pan. Allow the prawns to cook for 5 mins with a lid on it. Add the red chilli  powder, salt and beat the eggs into the cooking pan.  Pour 1/2 cup of water. Leave it for 10 min in a slow flame with a lid on it. Mix the curry. The eggs and prawns will be cooked without any smell. Add the spices and salt according to your taste.  Add garam masala to it.  Cook until the water is totally evaporated. Leave some sauce to mix it with rice. Add coriander leaves to it and switch off the stove. Done! Finished.
